question:
With reference to the signing of agreement between India and Mongolia, consider the following statements about this country:
  1. Mongolia has coasts along the South China Sea.
  2. The Gobi Desert is located to the north of Mongolia.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: Mongolia is a landlocked country in Asia. It is located between Russia and China. It is one of the most sparsely populated countries in the world. India has entered into an agreement to cooperate with Mongolia on space sector for civilian purposes. Statement 2 is incorrect: The Gobi Desert is a cold desert. It is found to the south of Mongolia. It also extends into northern parts of China. The region has been expanding due to desertification. This is especially so the Chinese stretch of the desert.
